title: Fix test failures: request/response file polling timeouts
notes: Fixed symlink path resolution bug in expandUser() - tests now correctly resolve /var to /private/var on macOS using realpathSync.native(). Fixed unused import 'waitFor' in efrit-client.test.ts. Remaining test failures appear to be test design issues (concurrent execute/waitFor race condition) rather than code bugs - follow-up issue needed.

title: Phase 4: Reorganize core modules into core/ directory
Module consolidation epic: 16 modules → 8 clean modules
description: Aggressive consolidation epic: Phase 1-2 DONE (chat+session merged). 16→14 modules so far. Target: ~8 clean modules in subdirectories (core/, interfaces/, support/). Maintains recent efrit-session/efrit-executor architecture improvements. Status: 2/7 phases complete.

title: MCP Server Production Readiness
efrit-do buffer management coupled to efrit-do-show-results customization
description: The remote queue's command execution fails with 'void-variable efrit-do-show-results' because it's a customization variable in efrit-do but treated as a required variable in remote-queue. Remote queue should either: 1) Not depend on interactive buffer display settings, or 2) Gracefully handle when efrit-do isn't loaded.

title: Community Readiness
description: Prepare for new maintainers: (1) contribution path and onboarding, (2) GitHub issue templates, (3) clear roadmap, (4) good first issue labels, (5) migration guide for early adopters.

title: Phase 3: Merge efrit-progress + efrit-performance + efrit-dashboard → support/efrit-ui.el
MCP Server Performance & Reliability
Add MCP server integration tests
description: Create test/server.test.ts with tests for protocol compliance, efrit_execute with different types, multi-instance routing, error responses, and timeout scenarios. Mock file system for CI/CD.

title: Phase 3: Merge efrit-progress + efrit-performance + efrit-dashboard → support/efrit-ui.el
description: Merge efrit-progress (386 lines, real-time progress display), efrit-performance (386 lines, caching/memory mgmt), efrit-dashboard (417 lines, session/TODO UI) into support/efrit-ui.el. Total ~1189 lines of UI/monitoring code.

title: efrit.el autoloads broken due to file reorganization into subdirectories
description: Files were reorganized into lisp/core/ and lisp/interfaces/ subdirectories, but efrit.el autoloads still reference files as if they're in lisp/ directly. This breaks when users don't have subdirectories in load-path. Need to either: 1) Update autoloads with subdirectory paths, 2) Add code to update load-path, or 3) Generate proper autoloads file.

title: Complete queue stats implementation or return null for unimplemented fields
Fix unused import 'waitFor' in efrit-client.test.ts
efrit-mode-map not available at load time causing daemon startup failure
description: The efrit-mode-map is defined in efrit-chat.el but efrit.el doesn't require it. This causes eval-after-load hooks that reference efrit-mode-map to fail. Need to either: 1) Move the mode-map to efrit.el, 2) Require efrit-chat in efrit.el, or 3) Use autoload cookies properly.

title: Validate Core Workflows End-to-End
description: Test each workflow: (1) efrit-chat - basic conversation, (2) efrit-do - sync command execution, (3) efrit-do-async - async execution (currently broken?), (4) efrit-remote-queue - AI-to-AI communication. Document what works and what's broken honestly.

title: Fix error instance check in pollForResponse causing tests to fail
Refactor async architecture: 4 modules → 2 clean modules (efrit-executor.el + efrit-session.el)
MCP Server Code Quality & Cleanup
Fix exponential backoff multiplier (1.1x too slow, use 1.5x or 2x)
Compilation warnings for docstring formatting in efrit-chat.el
description: Multiple compilation warnings in efrit-chat.el: unescaped single quotes in custom-declare-variable docstrings (lines 86, 94) and efrit--safe-error-message (line 149). Should use \=' instead of ' in docstrings per Emacs conventions.

title: Create ONBOARDING.md for new maintainers
description: Create onboarding guide: Efrit in 5 Minutes (demo GIF), Core Philosophy (Pure Executor), What's Working/Broken (honest list), Quick Wins (good first issues), How to Get Help (Discord/Discussions).

title: Compilation warnings for docstring width in efrit-do.el
description: Multiple compilation warnings in efrit-do.el for docstrings wider than 80 characters (lines 77, 84, 170, 332). Should wrap docstrings to stay within 80 character limit per Emacs conventions.

title: Missing protocol version constant in efrit-remote-queue
description: The constant efrit-remote-queue-protocol-version is not defined anywhere in efrit-remote-queue.el, but protocol version is hardcoded as '1.0.0' in validation. Should define (defconst efrit-remote-queue-protocol-version "1.0.0") for clarity and maintainability.

title: Phase 1: Merge efrit-chat + efrit-chat-streamlined → core/efrit-chat.el
MCP Server Test Infrastructure
Modernize Development Experience
description: Add modern tooling: (1) efrit-run-tests and efrit-version functions, (2) CI/CD pipeline for Emacs 28.1/28.2/29.1, (3) DEVELOPMENT.md onboarding guide, (4) better logging and error recovery, (5) performance monitoring.

title: Fix MCP tool schema registration - using Zod instead of JSON Schema
efrit.el missing declare-function for efrit-common-get-api-key causing compilation warning
description: efrit.el calls efrit-common-get-api-key on line 127 but doesn't have a declare-function or require statement at the file level. The function is only required inside efrit-version and efrit-doctor. Should add (declare-function efrit-common-get-api-key "efrit-common") at top of file to eliminate compilation warning.

title: Make MCP schemas AI-friendly with passthrough and coerce
Add p-limit concurrency control to MCP server
Refactor async architecture: 4 modules → 2 clean modules (efrit-executor.el + efrit-session.el)
Complete MCP Server Implementation
description: MCP server is 50% complete. Need: (1) actual server.ts implementation with protocol handler, (2) tool registration (efrit_execute, efrit_list_instances), (3) request routing to queue system, (4) error handling and logging, (5) integration tests. See docs/mcp-implementation-plan.md for details.

title: Phase 1: Merge efrit-chat + efrit-chat-streamlined → core/efrit-chat.el
Add efrit-run-tests and efrit-version utility functions
description: Add to lisp/efrit.el: (1) efrit-run-tests - run all tests interactively, (2) efrit-version - show version and health check status, (3) efrit-doctor - validate installation.

title: Fix Tool Selection Loop Prevention
description: Address todo_get_instructions infinite loops. Implement: (1) Schema-based prevention (dynamic tool schemas per workflow state), (2) Circuit breaker (hard limits on tool calls), (3) Better loop detection and recovery. See ARCHITECTURE.md anti-patterns.

title: Fix error instance check in pollForResponse causing tests to fail
Phase 6: Update all require statements and autoloads
Simplify async execution architecture
description: Current async system is complex with efrit-async, efrit-unified, efrit-context, efrit-protocol. Consider unified efrit-executor with modes (sync/async/auto). Fewer moving parts = easier maintenance.

title: Phase 7: Test compilation and runtime after consolidation
Load path management: subdirectories not automatically added to load-path
description: After refactoring into lisp/core/ and lisp/interfaces/, users must manually add these subdirectories to load-path. efrit.el should automatically add its subdirectories to load-path on load, or provide an efrit-setup-load-path function. This affects package.el, use-package, and manual installations.

title: Fix MCP Server Dependencies
description: MCP server npm install failing with missing module errors (resolve.exports). Run 'cd mcp && npm install --force' to fix. Prevents MCP server development.

title: Implement MCP server.ts with protocol handler
description: Create mcp/src/server.ts with MCP protocol compliance, configuration loading, tool registration, request routing, and error handling. See Phase 2.1 in mcp-implementation-plan.md.

title: Implement efrit_execute tool with parameter validation
description: Add efrit_execute tool to MCP server with validation, routing to appropriate Efrit instance via queue, and response formatting. Support command/eval/chat types.

title: Implement rate limiting or remove from config
Create DEVELOPMENT.md onboarding guide
description: Create developer onboarding with: Quick Start (5 min), Architecture in 2 Minutes (Zero Client-Side Intelligence), Common Tasks (adding tools, debugging loops, testing with real API).

title: Add TROUBLESHOOTING.md guide
description: Create troubleshooting guide covering: test infrastructure issues, MCP server errors, tool selection loops, async workflow problems, common Emacs/Elisp issues.

title: Session lifecycle triggers on module load causing spurious session start/end
description: During module loading (require 'efrit-do'), a session is started and immediately ended, causing 'Efrit session started/ended' messages in logs. Session lifecycle should not trigger on module load - only when actual commands are executed. Check efrit-session.el initialization code.

title: Phase 2: Merge efrit-session + efrit-session-tracker → core/efrit-session.el
Update ROADMAP.md with realistic milestones
description: Update plans/ROADMAP.md: v0.4.0 (fix foundation), v0.5.0 (stability), v1.0.0 (production ready). Remove outdated critical issues. Focus on working incrementally.

title: Improve error recovery and logging
description: Centralize logging with efrit-log function (levels: DEBUG/INFO/WARN/ERROR). Add efrit--safe-execute for comprehensive error handling with recovery hints. Add *efrit-log* buffer.

title: Fix Test Infrastructure
description: Test runner scripts are missing. Makefile references non-existent test/efrit-test-simple.sh. Create basic test runner and document existing tests. Critical blocker for development.

title: Add GitHub issue templates
description: Create .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/ with: bug_report.md (Emacs version, API key check, minimal repro), feature_request.md (must align with Pure Executor principle), documentation.md.

title: Efrit Modernization for Community Readiness
description: Modernize Efrit's infrastructure, documentation, and development experience before new maintainers join. Focus on: (1) fixing broken test/build infrastructure, (2) completing MCP server, (3) consolidating scattered documentation, (4) adding modern dev tooling and CI/CD.

title: Implement schema-based tool prevention
description: Create efrit-do--get-tools-for-state that returns different tool schemas based on workflow state: planning (todo_*), executing (eval_sexp, shell_exec), error-recovery. Prevent Claude from calling wrong tools.

title: Add response validation for status enum and version compatibility
Consolidate Documentation
description: Documentation is scattered across 9+ files in plans/ with contradictory status updates. Create single source of truth (STATUS.md), archive stale planning docs, update README with realistic capabilities, add troubleshooting guide.

title: Add SIGHUP signal handling for server reload
Add pino logging to MCP server
Undefined variable efrit-do-show-results when executing command via remote queue
description: Remote queue file has forward declaration 'defvar efrit-do-show-results' but actual definition is defcustom. This causes void-variable error when commands execute via remote queue. Line 28 in efrit-remote-queue.el needs to use declare-function or require efrit-do instead of defvar forward declaration.

title: Create STATUS.md as single source of truth
description: Create STATUS.md documenting: current state, what works/doesn't work, known issues (tool loops, async workflow), recent progress, critical blockers. Replace scattered status updates in plans/*.

title: Fix MCP server logging to stderr polluting stdio transport
Add integration tests for MCP server with real protocol communication
Missing efrit-multi-turn-chat interactive command despite autoload in efrit.el
description: efrit.el line 111 has autoload for efrit-remote-queue-status but there's no corresponding interactive function in efrit-multi-turn.el. The multi-turn module only has internal functions like efrit--start-multi-turn-if-needed. Either: 1) Remove the bogus autoload, or 2) Add a user-facing efrit-multi-turn-chat command if multi-turn is meant to be user-invoked.

title: Add circuit breaker for tool call limits
description: Track tool calls per session in efrit-do--tool-call-counts hash table. Block tools after max calls (e.g., 3 for todo_get_instructions). Return clear error to Claude about hitting limit.

title: Align MCP tool names with constants or remove MCP_TOOLS constants
Add MIGRATION.md for early adopters
description: Create migration guide for existing users: breaking changes in v0.4.0+, configuration updates, deprecated commands (efrit-command, efrit-agent), rollback instructions.

title: Remove unused uuid dependency (using crypto.randomUUID)
Rebase and merge PR #17 (flexible auth and base URL)
Fix Makefile compilation for files with dependencies
description:
The Makefile compilation rule doesn't properly handle files with (require ...) dependencies. Multiple files fail to compile due to missing dependency loading during batch-byte-compile.

Issue discovered during PR #10 testing:
- efrit-chat.el fails to compile (can't find efrit-tools)
- efrit-command.el fails to compile (can't find efrit-tools)
- Other files likely affected

Root cause: The batch-byte-compile process needs dependencies preloaded, but the Makefile rule at line 66-71 doesn't do this.

Fix approach: Update compilation rule to preload dependencies before compiling, similar to:
emacs --batch --eval "(require 'efrit-config)" --eval "(require 'efrit-tools)" -f batch-byte-compile file.el

title: Consolidate module structure (17 modules → cleaner org)
description: Phase 1-2 complete: Merged chat modules (760+469→unified) and session modules (548+313→861). Reduced from 16→14 modules. Next: merge UI modules (progress+performance+dashboard→support/efrit-ui.el), reorganize into subdirs, update requires, test.

title: efrit-multi-turn-chat function does not exist after refactoring
description: The function efrit-multi-turn-chat is referenced but doesn't exist. The multi-turn module was refactored to use internal functions only. Remove autoload reference or add missing interactive command.

title: Import schema version from package.json instead of hardcoding
Add CI/CD pipeline for multi-version Emacs testing
description: Create .github/workflows/test.yml to test on Emacs 28.1, 28.2, 29.1. Run make compile and make test. Use purcell/setup-emacs action.

title: Remote queue 'chat' type not documented or tested
description: Remote queue supports types: command, chat, eval. The 'chat' type is not documented in any user-facing docs and wasn't tested during manual testing. Need to: 1) Document what 'chat' type does, 2) Test it works, 3) Provide examples in docs or tests.

title: Remote queue does not clean up processing directory after completion
description: When a request is processed successfully and response is written, the original request file remains in ~/.emacs.d/.efrit/queues/processing/ instead of being moved to archive/. This causes queue pollution. Files should be moved to archive/ after response is written.

title: Archive stale planning documents
description: Move outdated plans/* files to plans/archive/. Keep only: CURRENT_STATUS.md (replaced by STATUS.md), ROADMAP.md, AUTONOMOUS_MODE_DESIGN.md. Archive contradictory/outdated docs.

title: Phase 2: Merge efrit-session + efrit-session-tracker → core/efrit-session.el
Add request file cleanup to prevent queue directory growth
Phase 5: Reorganize interfaces into interfaces/ directory
Add performance monitoring and metrics
description: Add efrit--metrics hash table to track: API call times, token usage, cache hit rates. Create efrit-show-metrics dashboard. Record with efrit--record-metric function.

title: Fix race conditions in MCP test helpers causing 10 test failures
